title: ArO nIyena
sahitya:
ArO nIyena vAyil aDaittu nAn vaittEnE aivaruDan kUDi ADik-kaLittEnE


anupallavi

  pArALa madan tenral tErErum iLavEnil shIrArum pozhudellAm nErAruDan tirindEn


caraNam    iDiyEru kuralOngak-koDiyODu min vAnga miDiyODu muduvEnil paDimishai vara nAnum 
paDar mEvi uLam nANi naDai vAshal tirandEnE aDI kANA anbODu adukArum ninrAyE
